#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int w[n];
		int t[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>w[i];
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		cin>>t[j];
		int score=0,maxscore=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			score=w[i]*3+t[i]*1;
			if(score>maxscore)
			maxscore=score;
		}
		cout<<maxscore<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
